#summary Enables bones on normal drones.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

Enables the possibility of having bones on a drone. This cvar does not guarantee bones, it simply add the possibility of randomly having them. This cvar was added to prevent drones from getting confused with the uber drones while [asw_uber_scary] was enabled.
